data.name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Mini-Album Track 9 - Three Wonders - Midnight Wanderers Stage 1-1 (Forest Country)
data.detailed_description:
This rousing opening stage theme from the Midnight Wanderers platformer included within Three Wonders is sure to instill nostalgic thoughts of running, climbing, and shooting as the heroes Lou and Siva.

Don't miss out on this classic!
